title: Freezing on AOD
content:
My Pixel 3xl 128 gb freezes whenever the screen is off long enough for the always on display to activate. The only solution is a soft reset which works until the screen times out again. 

So far I have tried rebooting, rebooting into safe mode, a factory reset, a factory reset and immediately into safe mode.

The problem returns after each factory reset, though it is gone for a few minutes. 

Please help with any suggestions or similar cases!
